With him were the twelve, "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"2"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"and certain women who had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities: Mary who was called Magdalene, from whom seven demons had gone out; "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"3"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"and Joanna, the wife of Chuzas, Herod’s steward; Susanna; and many others; who served them from their possessions. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"4"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"4"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"When a great multitude came together, and people from every city were coming to him, he spoke by a parable. "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Crowd"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"5"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"5"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“The farmer went out to sow his seed. As he sowed, some fell along the road, and it was trampled under foot, and the birds of the sky devoured it. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"6"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Other seed fell on the rock, and as soon as it grew, it withered away, because it had no moisture. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"7"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Other fell amid the thorns, and the thorns grew with it, and choked it. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"8"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Other fell into the good ground, and grew, and produced one hundred times as much fruit.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"As he said these things, he called out, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Crowd","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os his disciples asked him, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"green","recipient":"Jesus","source":"The Disciples","time_period":["0s does this parable mean?” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"10"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He said, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Disciples","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Disciples"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"10"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“To you it is given to know the mysteries of the Kingdom of God, but to the rest in parables; that ‘seeing they may not see, and hearing they may not understand.’ "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"11"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"11"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Now the parable is this: The seed is the word of God. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"12"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"12"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Those along the road are those who hear, then the devil comes, and takes away the word from their heart, that they may not believe and be saved. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"13"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"13"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Those on the rock are they who, when they hear, receive the word with joy; but these have no root, who believe for a while, then fall away in time of temptation. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"14"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"14"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"That which fell among the thorns, these are those who have heard, and as they go on their way they are choked with cares, riches, and pleasures of life, and bring no fruit to maturity. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"15"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"15"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"That in the good ground, these are such as in an honest and good heart, having heard the word, hold it tightly, and produces fruit with patience. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"16"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"16"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“No one, when he has lit a lamp, covers it with a container, or puts it under a bed; but puts it on a stand, that those who enter in may see the light. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"17"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"17"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"For nothing is hidden, that will not be revealed; nor anything secret, that will not be known and come to light. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"18"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"18"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Be careful therefore how you hear. For whoever has, to him will be given; and whoever doesn’t have, from him will be taken away even that which he thinks he has.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"19"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"19"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"His mother and brothers came to him, and they could not come near him for the crowd. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"20"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"20"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"It was told him by some saying, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"Someone in Capernaum","time_period":["0s on one of those days, he entered into a boat, himself and his disciples, and he said to them, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Disciples","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The go over to the other side of the lake.” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"22"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"So they launched out. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"23"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"23"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"But as they sailed, he fell asleep. A wind storm came down on the lake, and they were taking on dangerous amounts of water. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"24"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"They came to him, and awoke him, saying, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"green","recipient":"Jesus","source":"The Disciples","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["The Disciples"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Master, master, we are dying!” "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"black","source":"The Narrator","time_period":["0s BC"],"unique_sources":["Luke"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"24"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He awoke, and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water, and they ceased, and it was calm. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"25"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"He said to them, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"red","recipient":"The Disciples","source":"Jesus","time_period":["0s BC","Os AD"],"unique_recipients":["The Disciples"],"unique_sources":["Jesus"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"8","verse":"25"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Where afraid they marveled, saying to one another, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"green","recipient":"The Disciples","source":"The Disciples","time_period":["0s Narrator","time_period":["0s
